thread.section_title: FlightNetwork.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightNetwork.com | www.flightnetwork.com
thread.title: George Draper

author: George Draper
title: George Draper
text: Flight Network got us decently-priced tickets Boston to West Palm after our Spirit flight was cancelled due to a blizzard and Spirit couldn't get us on a plane for at least a week. In a bust season, this was much appreciated! The flight was AA Boston-La Guardia-West Palm, and I was told that the agent couldn't get us seat assignments for the La Guardi-West Palm leg for some reason. A day later, just checking on the flight, I was able to get the last two seats available on that flight. Lucky I checked!
